mapper.select: SELECT A.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT GROUP_ID, GROUP_NAME, GROUP_SORT, TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DT, GET_CODE_NAME('1', USE_YN) AS USE_YN FROM CODE_GROUP ORDER BY GROUP_SORT ASC,GROUP_ID ASC )A OFFSET (#{pageIndex} - 1) * #{pageSize} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageSize} ROWS ONLY

SELECT A.*, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM ( SELECT B.GROUP_ID, B.CODE_ID, B.CODE_NAME, B.CODE_SORT, B.REG_DT, B.USE_YN FROM CODE_GROUP A, CODE B WHERE A.GROUP_ID = B.GROUP_ID AND A.USE_YN = 1 ORDER BY A.GROUP_SORT ASC, B.CODE_SORT ASC )A OFFSET (#{pageIndex} - 1) * #{pageSize} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageSize} ROWS ONLY
SELECT B.GROUP_ID, B.CODE_ID, B.CODE_NAME, B.CODE_SORT FROM CODE_GROUP A, CODE B WHERE A.GROUP_ID = B.GROUP_ID AND A.USE_YN = 1 AND B.USE_YN = 1 AND A.GROUP_ID = #{group_id} ORDER BY B.CODE_SORT ASC
SELECT GROUP_ID,GROUP_NAME,GROUP_SORT, TO_CHAR(REG_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DT, GET_CODE_NAME('1', USE_YN) AS USE_YN FROM CODE_GROUP WHERE GROUP_ID = #{group_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE CODE_GROUP SET GROUP_NAME = #{ group_name}, GROUP_SORT = #{group_sort}, USE_YN = #{use_yn}, REG_DT=SYSDATE WHERE GROUP_ID = #{group_id}
